description: Featuring an iconic design, GORE-TEX® technology, and street-smart extras, the Men’s Mammoth Parka is back in an oversized package worthy of its name. Waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX fabric keeps you dry, plus its 100% seam-taped construction prevents leaks. On cold city nights, the lightweight 700-fill-power-down body and hood ensure you stay warm. A moisture-wicking, DriClime®-lined chin guard adds comfort while the powder skirt, drawcord waist, and VELCRO® cuffs shield snow from reaching inner layers. Stow small gear in this winter coat's handwarmer and media pockets.
name: Marmot Mammoth GTX Parka - Mens

specs.value: Gore-Tex® Products 2 L 100% Nylon Plain Weave 4.4 oz
